source.b311e6d4:
# A: make a bar chart with Data
# H axis: blod groups 
# V axis : population

#import libraries
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x=[30, 24, 8, 38]
y=['A','B','AB','O']
fig_bar=plt.figure()
ax_bar=fig_bar.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
plot_bar=ax_bar.bar(y,x,color='#ffcc56', width=0.3, edgecolor='#87cc00',linewidth=2)
ax_bar.set_title('Blood Groups population',fontsize=16)
ax_bar.set_ylabel('population',fontsize=14)
ax_bar.set_xlabel('Blood Group',fontsize=14)
ax_bar.bar_label(plot_bar, label_type='center',fontsize=12)
plt.show()
source.129492da:
# B: Make a pie chart with Data

labels='A','B','AB','O'
sizes=[30, 24, 8, 38]

fig_pie,ax_pie=plt.subplots(figsize=(8,8))
fig_pie.subplots_adjust(wspace=0)

# pie chart parameters for styling
color=['#ffcc00', '#12a846','#0fed0c','#dc1006']                            
ratios = [sizes[0]/100, sizes[1]/100, sizes[2]/100, sizes[3]/100]
explode = [0.1, 0.1, 0.1, 0.1]
ax_pie.set_title('Blood Groups Population')
ax_pie.pie(ratios, autopct='%1.1f%%', labels=labels,colors=color, explode=explode,shadow=True)
ax_pie.axis('equal')

plt.show()
source.958fac4a:
x=[5,7,8,7,2,17,2,9,4,11,12,9,6]
y=[99,86,87,88,111,86,103,87,94,78,77,85,86]

fig_scatter=plt.figure()
ax_scatter=fig_scatter.add_axes([0,0,1,1])

#Styling
ax_scatter.set_xlabel('Viscosity')
ax_scatter.grid(axis='both')
ax_scatter.set_ylabel('Pressure')
ax_scatter.set_title('Oil Viscosity/Pressure')

plt.scatter(x,y,s=50)


plt.show()
